ygData.subject: Re: Whats UP!!???
ygData.msgSnippet: There s lots of great charts for this type of info at the ragers glade website.  The url is http://empty.com/rangers .  So what does everyone think about the
ygData.messageBody:
There's lots of great charts for this type of info at the ragers' glade website. The url is http://empty.com/rangers . So what does everyone think about the latest patch making micro servos and dwarven wire no drop? I think it was the wrong approach. They should have just made the bow no drop, and left the component gathering open in case some newbies wanted to make a bit of cash killing rogue clockworks. I also heard a rumor that the lantern Jyle no longer gives the treant wood, and instead has been giving fire beetle eyes. Can anyone confirm this?

Slig of Povar
Wood Elven Ranger of the 18th season
Master Fletcher (140)

>>> <2as1@...> 07/29 5:58 AM >>>
From: 2as1@...

Why did this list just go completely dead? i
haven't had an e-mail in something like 4 days!
I want to revive this list by asking the master
fletchers out there if they could compile a list
for the skill level when certain items become
trivial. Also could someone give me a good price
list for arrows and bows. I just want to be fair
to my customers and to the rest of you if I'm not
charging enough. Please let's jumpstart this worn
out mailing list and turn it into the powerful
think tank it once was.

Kronalin, minor fletcher and Champion of Tunare
